content: Sept 9 Canadian insurer Sun Life Financial Inc  said it would buy New York-based insurer Assurant Inc's  employee-benefits business for $975 million  creating the sixth largest group benefits business in the United States.
name: Assurant Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Sun Life to buy U.S. insurer Assurant's unit for $975 mln

content: Canadian insurer Sun Life Financial Inc  is in talks to buy New York-based insurer Assurant Inc's  employee-benefits unit for about $900 million  Bloomberg reported  citing people familiar with the matter.
name: Assurant Inc
title: Canada's Sun Life in talks to buy Assurant's unit: Bloomberg

content: Aug 24 Canadian insurer Sun Life Financial Inc  is in talks to buy New York-based insurer Assurant Inc's employee-benefits unit for about $900 million  Bloomberg reported  citing people familiar with the matter.
name: Assurant Inc
title: Canada's Sun Life in talks to buy Assurant's unit -Bloomberg

content: HSBC Mortgage Services and insurer Assurant Inc have agreed to pay $1.8 million to settle claims that they unfairly profited from flood insurance homeowners were forced to buy when their own coverage lapsed.
name: Assurant Inc
title: HSBC  Assurant settle flood insurance class actions for $1.8 mln
